item.title: Are We At Peak AI Bubble And The Cusp Of ‘AI Moment’?
item.description: The AI bubble may burst soon, followed by a period of reckoning, and then the emergence of productive AI-based business practices.

item.title: New Windows 11 Account Bypass Hack Confirmed—What You Must Do Now
item.description: As one popular Microsoft Windows 11 Account bypass hack gets blocked, another comes along. Here’s what you need to know and do—but do it quickly.

item.title: How The Layoff Of 10,000 Health Workers From HHS Could Affect Your Health
item.description: The U.S. Department of Health and Human Services will cut 10,000 full-time jobs, which could have dramatic effects on the health of Americans.

item.title: The African Movement To Keep Chickens Out Of Cages
item.description: As egg production industrializes in Africa, animal welfare advocates and some industry voices are working to maintain cage-free spaces for chickens.

item.title: How To Tell If Your iPhone Was Hacked – 6 Warning Signs
item.description: Learn how to spot the warning signs that your iPhone may have been hacked. Stay alert and protect your apple device from potential threats.
